text: a little while ago I shared my top six
Travel must-haves and now I'm going to
share six more in no particular order
number one is for the ladies
a female urinary device you see me use
it in one video wish I had it in another
now it has made my top travel must-have
list the female urinary device basically
allows you to pee standing up you can
easily slip it into your pants even your
zipper and relieve yourself without
hassle or mess although it's easier to
wear skirt it's a lot more discreet than
popping a squat don't mind me you're
just admiring these lovely petunias
number two all-in-one laundry all you
need is a ziploc bag some soap you can
even use shampoo and a rope and you've
got yourself a washer and dryer for your
smaller items of clothing all you do is
fill the bag like so with some water and
soap pop in the dirty item of clothing
close a bag and give it a shake
massaging it as well open the bag and
empty rinse your clothing and hang it on
the clothing line number three is a
smart phone a smart phone is an
excellent device to bring with you you
can take pictures and videos with it you
can connect to the internet anywhere
Wi-Fi is available and even download the
Skype app and use it to make calls it's
a hell of a lot cheaper too it can also
be used as an alarm clock and notebook
number four is a neck pillow I always
use the laughs of people who use neck
pillows on planes now I'm one of those
people I can no longer go on long trips
without it it makes sleeping on planes
so much easier and comfortable
especially if you aren't lucky enough to
get a window seat and are stuck with
nowhere to rest your head that's when
the neck pillow comes in to save the day
you can use it on buses and trains too
number five a day pack having a good
quality day pack is essential when
traveling you're not going to lug around
a big bag everywhere you go so having a
smaller one that has good support is
important I always bring a waterproof
backpack with me I can use it if I'm
walking down the streets or going on an
intense hike it's also good to have to
keep your valuables in when you're on an
overnight bus or train while you may not
be able to keep your big bag with you by
your feet you can keep your smaller more
important bag with you throughout the
entire ride and number six is a cup yes
a cup and this guy has been all around
the world with me literally you can use
it for so many types of things any type
of beverage soup tea water alcohol and
you can even use it for breakfast have
some cereal now I want to know what are
your travel must-haves would you
absolutely have to bring with you on
your travels let us know in the comment
box below happy travels
